GV05isupsb_u:1: , Kāṇva recension with the commentary ascribed to Śaṃkara oṃ
GV05isupsb_u:4: oṃ pūrṇam adaḥ pūrṇam idaṃ pūrṇāt pūrṇam udacyate /
GV05isupsb_u:10: tacca karmaṇā virudhyeteti yukta evaiṣāṃ karmasvaviniyogaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:11: na hyevaṃ lakṣaṇamātmano yāthātmyamutpādyaṃ vikāryamāpyaṃ saṃskāryaṃ kartṛbhoktṛrūpaṃ vā yena karmaśeṣatā syāt /
GV05isupsb_u:15: yo hi karmaphalenārthī dṛṣṭena brahmavarcasādinādṛṣṭena svargādinā ca dvijātirahaṃ
GV05isupsb_u:18: tasmādete mantrā ātmano yāthātmyaprakāśanena ātmaviṣayaṃ svābhāvikamajñānaṃ nivartayantaḥ śokamohādisaṃsāradharmavicchittisādhanamātmaikatvādivijñānamutpādayanti
GV05isupsb_u:20: īśā vāsyam idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiñca jagatyāṃ jagat /
GV05isupsb_u:21: tena tyaktena bhuñjīthā mā gṛdhaḥ kasya sviddhanam // IsUp_1 //
GV05isupsb_u:24: sa hi sarvamīṣṭe sarvajantūnāmātmā sanpratyagātmatayā tena svena rūpeṇātmaneśā vāsyamācchādanīyam /
GV05isupsb_u:25: kim? idaṃ sarva yatkiñca yatkiñcijjagatyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ jagattatsarvaṃ svenātmanā īśena
GV05isupsb_u:26: pratyagātmatayāhamevedaṃ sarvamiti paramārthasatyarūpeṇānṛtamidaṃ sarvaṃ carācaramācchādanīyaṃ svena paramātmanā /
GV05isupsb_u:27: yathā candanāgarvāderudakādisambandhajakledādijamaupādhikaṃ daurgandhyaṃ tatsvarūpanigharṣaṇena ācchāghate svena pāramārthikena gandhena /
GV05isupsb_u:28: tadvadeva hi svātmani adhyastaṃ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādilakṣaṇaṃ jagadadvaitarūpaṃ jagatyāṃ pṛthivyām,
GV05isupsb_u:29: jagatyāmiti upalakṣaṇārthatvātsarvameva nāmarūpakarmākhyaṃ vikārajātaṃ paramārthasatyātmabhāvanayā tyaktaṃ syāt /
GV05isupsb_u:30: evamīśvarātmabhāvanayā yuktasya putrādyeṣaṇātrayasaṃnyāsa evādhikāro na karmasu /
GV05isupsb_u:32: na hi tyakto mṛtaḥ putro vā bhṛtyo vā ātmasambandhitāyā abhāvāt ātmānaṃ pālayati atastyāgena ityayameva vedārthaḥ-- bhuñjīthāḥ pālayethāḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:33: evaṃ tyaktaiṣaṇastvaṃ mā gṛdhaḥ gṛdhimākāṅkṣāṃ mā kārṣīrdhanaviṣayām kasyasviddhanaṃ kasyacitparasya svasya vā dhanaṃ mā kāṅkṣīrityarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:37: ātmaivedaṃ sarvamitīśvarabhāvanayā sarvaṃ tyaktamata ātmana evedaṃ sarvamātmaiva ca sarvamato mithyāviṣayāṃ gṛdhiṃ mā kārṣīrityarthaḥ //IsUpBh_1//
GV05isupsb_u:41: evaṃ tvayi nānyatheto 'sti na karma lipyate nare // IsUp_2 //
GV05isupsb_u:42: kurvanneva iha nivartayanneva karmāṇyagnihotrādīni jijīviṣejjīvitumicchecchataṃ śatasaṅkhyākāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarān /
GV05isupsb_u:44: tathā ca prāptānuvādena yajjijīviṣecchataṃ varṣāṇi tat kurvanneva karmāṇītyetadvidhīyate /
GV05isupsb_u:45: evamevamprakāreṇa tvayi jijīviṣati nare naramātrābhimāninīta etasmādagnihotrādīni
GV05isupsb_u:46: karmāṇi kurvato vartamānātprakārādanyathā prakārāntaraṃ nāsti yena prakāreṇāśubhaṃ
GV05isupsb_u:47: karma na lipyate karmaṇā na lipyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:49: kathaṃ punaridamavagamyate pūrveṇa saṃnyāsino jñānaniṣṭhoktā dvitīyena tadaśaktasya karmaniṣṭheti /
GV05isupsb_u:50: ucyateḥ jñānakarmaṇorvirodhaṃ parvatavadakampyaṃ yathoktaṃ na smarasi kim /
GV05isupsb_u:51: ihāpyuktaṃ 'yo hi jijīviṣet sa karma kurvan' 'īśāvāsyamidaṃ sarvam' 'tena tyaktena bhuñjīthāḥ' 'mā gṛdhaḥ kasyasviddhanam' iti ca /
GV05isupsb_u:52: 'na jīvite maraṇe vā gṛdhiṃ kurvītāraṇyamiyāditi ca param ;
GV05isupsb_u:55: imau dvāveva panthānāvanuniṣkrāntatarau bhavataḥ kriyāpathaścaiva purastātsaṃnyāsaścottareṇa /
GV05isupsb_u:61: ityādi putrāya vicārya niścitamuktaṃ vyāsena vedācāryeṇa bhagavatā vibhāgañcānayoḥ darśayiṣyāmaḥ //IsUpBh_2//
GV05isupsb_u:63: asuryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasāvṛtāḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:64: tāṃste pretyābhigacchanti ye ke cātmahano janāḥ // IsUp_3 //
GV05isupsb_u:65: asuryāḥ paramātmabhāvamadvayamapekṣya devādayo 'pyasurāsteṣāñca svabhūtā lokā asuryā nāma /
GV05isupsb_u:69: andhenādarśanātmakenājñānena tamasāvṛtā ācchāditāḥ tāṃsthāvarāntānpretya tyaktvemaṃ dehamabhigacchanti yathākarma yathāśrutam /
GV05isupsb_u:73: avidyādoṣeṇa vidyamānasyātmanaḥ tiraskaraṇāt vidyamānasya ātmano yatkāryaṃ phalamajarāmaratvādisaṃvedanalakṣaṇaṃ
GV05isupsb_u:74: taddhatasyeva tirobhūtaṃ bhavatīti prākṛtāvidvāṃso janāḥ janāḥ ātmahana ucyante /
GV05isupsb_u:76: yasyātmano hananādavidvāṃsaḥ saṃsaranti tadviparyayeṇa vidvāṃso janā mucyante te nātmahanaḥ tat kīghśamātmatacvamityucyate--
GV05isupsb_u:77: anejad ekaṃ manaso javīyo nainaddevā āpnuvanpūrvamarṣat /
GV05isupsb_u:78: taddhāvato 'nyānatyeti tiṣṭhat tasminn apo mātariśvā dadhāti // IsUp_4 //
GV05isupsb_u:82: taccaikaṃ sarvabhūteṣu manasaḥ saṅkalpādilakṣaṇād javīyo javavattaram /
GV05isupsb_u:83: kathaṃ viruddhamucyate dhruvaṃ niścalamidaṃ manaso javīya iti ca /
GV05isupsb_u:85: nirupādhyupādhimattvenopapatteḥ tatra nirupādhikena svena rūpeṇocyate anejadekamiti
GV05isupsb_u:87: manaso brahmalokādidūragamanaṃ saṅkalpena kṣaṇamātrādbhavatītyato manaso javiṣṭhatvaṃ loke prasiddham /
GV05isupsb_u:88: tasmin manasi brahmalokādīn drutaṃ gacchati sati prathamaṃ prāpta ivātmacaitanyāvabhāso gṛhyate 'to manaso javīya ityāha /
GV05isupsb_u:90: tebhyo mano javīyaḥ manovyāpāravyavahitatvād ābhāsamātramapi ātmano naiva devānāṃ viṣayībhavati /
GV05isupsb_u:91: yasmājjavanānmanaso 'pi pūrvamarṣat pūrvameva gataṃ vyomavadvyāpitvāt sarvavyāpi
GV05isupsb_u:93: sadupādhikṛtāḥ sarvāḥ saṃsāravikriyā anubhavatītyavivekināṃ mūḍhānāmanekamiva ca
GV05isupsb_u:95: taddhāvato drutaṃ gacchato 'nyānātmavilakṣaṇānmanovāgindriyaprabhṛtīnatyeti atītya gacchati iva /
GV05isupsb_u:96: ivārthaṃ svayameva darśayati tiṣṭhaditi svayamavikriyameva sadityarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:97: tasminnātmatattve sati nityacaitanyasvabhāve mātariśvā vāyuḥ sarvaprāṇabhṛt kriyātmako
GV05isupsb_u:98: yadāśrayāṇi kāryakaraṇajātāni yasminnotāni protāni ca yatsūtrasaṃjñakaṃ sarvasya
GV05isupsb_u:104: sarvā hi kāryakaraṇādivikriyā nityacaitanyātmasvarūpe sarvāspadabhūte satyeva bhavantītyarthaḥ //IsUpBh_4//
GV05isupsb_u:106: tad ejati tan naijati tad dūre tad v antike /

GV05isupsb_u:108: tadātmatattvaṃ yatprakṛtaṃ tadejati calati tadeva ca naijati svato naiva calati svato 'calameva sat
GV05isupsb_u:112: tadvantike samīpe 'tyantameva viduṣāmātmatvānna kevalaṃ dūre 'ntike ca /
GV05isupsb_u:114: 1) iti śruteḥ asya sarvasya jagato nāma rūpakriyātmakasya tadu api sarvasya asya bāhyato vyāpakatvādākāśavanniratiśayasūkṣmatvād antaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:117: yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāny ātmany evānupaśyati /
GV05isupsb_u:118: sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ tato na vijugupsate // IsUp_6 //
GV05isupsb_u:119: yaḥ parivrāḍ mumukṣuḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavyaktādīni sthāvarāntāni ātmanyevānupaśyatyātmavyatiriktāni na paśyatītyarthaḥ,
GV05isupsb_u:120: sarvabhūteṣu ca teṣveva cātmānaṃ teṣām api bhūtānāṃ svamātmānamātmatvena yathāsya
GV05isupsb_u:121: dehasya kāryakaraṇasaṅdhātasyātmā ahaṃ sarvapratyayasākṣibhūtaścetayitā kevalo nirguṇo
GV05isupsb_u:123: yastvanupaśyati sa tatastasmādeva darśanānna vijugupsate vijugupsāṃ ghṛṇāṃ na karoti /
GV05isupsb_u:126: ātmānamevātyantaviśuddhaṃ nirantaraṃ paśyato na ghṛṇānimittam arthāntaramastīti prāptameva /
GV05isupsb_u:130: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvam anupaśyataḥ // IsUp_7 //
GV05isupsb_u:131: yasminkāle yathoktātmani vā tānyeva bhūtāni sarvāṇi paramārthātmadarśanādātmaivābhūd ātmaiva saṃvṛtaḥ paramārthavastu vijānataḥ tatra tasminkāle tatrātmani vā ko mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:133: na tvātmaikatvaṃ viśuddhaṃ gaganopamaṃ paśyataḥ ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka iti śokamohayoravidyākāryayorākṣepeṇa
GV05isupsb_u:135: yo 'yamatītairmantrairukta ātmā sa svena rūpeṇa kiṃlakṣaṇa ityāhāyaṃ mantraḥ--
GV05isupsb_u:136: sa paryagāc chukram akāyam avraṇam asnāviraṃ śuddham apāpaviddham /
GV05isupsb_u:137: kavir manīṣī paribhūḥ svayambhūr yāthātathyator 'thān vyadadhāc chāśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ // IsUp_8 //
GV05isupsb_u:138: sa yathokta ātmā paryagāt pari samantādagādgatavānākāśavadvyāpī ityarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:142: asnāviraṃ snāvāḥ śirā yasminna vidyanta ityasnāviram /
GV05isupsb_u:151: maniṣī manasa īṣitā sarvajña īśvara ityarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:154: yeṣāmupari bhavati yaścopari bhavati sa sarvaḥ svayameva bhavatīti svayambhūḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:155: sa nityamukta īśvaro yāthātathyataḥ sarvajñatvādyathātathābhāvo yāthātathyaṃ tasmādyathābhūtakarmaphalasādhanator'thān
GV05isupsb_u:157: śāśvatībhyo nityābhyaḥ samābhyaḥ saṃvatsarākhyebhyaḥ prajāpatibhya ityarthaḥ //IsUpBh_8//
GV05isupsb_u:158: atrādyena mantreṇa sarvaiṣaṇāparityāgena jñānaniṣṭhoktā prathamo vedārthaḥ“īśā vāsyamidaṃ sarvaṃ...mā gṛdhaḥ kasyasviddhanam“iti /
GV05isupsb_u:159: ajñānāṃ jijīviṣūṇāṃ jñānaniṣṭhāsambhave“kurvanneveha karmāṇi...jijīviṣet“iti karmaniṣṭhoktā dvitīyo vedārthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:160: anayośva niṣṭhayorvibhāgo mantrapradarśitayorbṛhadāraṇyake 'pi pradarśitaḥ “so 'kāmayata jāyā me syāt“(bṛ. u. 1 / 4 /
GV05isupsb_u:163: 17) ityādivacanād ajñatvaṃ kāmitvaṃ ca karmaniṣṭhasya niścitamavagamyate /
GV05isupsb_u:165: jāyādyeṣaṇātrayasaṃnyāsena ca ātmavidāṃ karmaniṣṭhāprātikūlyenātmasvarūpaniṣṭhaiva darśitā“kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ“(bṛ. u. 4 / 4 / 22) ityādinā /
GV05isupsb_u:166: ye tu jñānaniṣṭhāḥ saṃnyāsinastebhyo 'suryā nāma ta ityādinā avidvannindādvāreṇa ātmano yāthātmyaṃ sa paryagāt ityetadantairmantrairupadiṣṭam
GV05isupsb_u:168: tathā ca śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ mantropaniṣadi“atyāśramibhyaḥ paramaṃ pavitraṃ provāca samyagṛṣisaṅghajuṣṭam“(śve. u. 6 /
GV05isupsb_u:170: ye tu karmiṇaḥ karmaniṣṭhāḥ karma kurvanta eva jijīviṣavastebhya idamucyate--

GV05isupsb_u:177: tatra ca yasya yena samuccayaḥ sambhavati nyāyataḥ śāstrato vā tadihocyate yaddaivaṃ vittaṃ devatāviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ karmasambandhitvenopanyastaṃ na paramātmajñānam /

GV05isupsb_u:183: tatra andhaṃ tamaḥ adarśanātmakaṃ tamaḥ praviśanti /
GV05isupsb_u:184: ke? ye 'vidyāṃ vidyāyā anyā avidyā tāṃ karma ityarthaḥ,
GV05isupsb_u:187: tatastasmādandhātmakāttamaso bhūya iva bahutarameva te tamaḥ praviśanti, ke?
GV05isupsb_u:188: karma itvā ye u ye tu vidyāyāmeva devatājñāna eva ratāḥ abhiratāḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:191: anyad evāhur vidyayān yad āhur avidyayā /
GV05isupsb_u:192: iti śuśruma dhīrāṇāṃ ye nas tad vicacakṣire // IsUp_10 //
GV05isupsb_u:195: ityevaṃ śuśruma śrutavanto vayaṃ dhīrāṇāṃ dhīmatāṃ vacanam /
GV05isupsb_u:196: ye ācāryā no 'smabhyaṃ tatkarma ca jñānaṃ ca vicacakṣire vyākhyātavantasteṣāmayamāgamaḥ pāramparyāgata ityarthaḥ //IsUpBh_10//
GV05isupsb_u:197: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yas tad vedobhayaṃ saha /
GV05isupsb_u:198: avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā vidyayāmṛtam aśnute // IsUp_11 //
GV05isupsb_u:199: yata evamato vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca devatājñānaṃ karma cetyarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:200: yastadetadubhayaṃ sahaikena puruṣeṇa anuṣṭheyaṃ veda tasyaivaṃ samuccayakāriṇa eva ekapuruṣārthasambandhaḥ krameṇa syādityucyate /
GV05isupsb_u:201: avidyayā karmaṇā agnihotrādinā mṛtyuṃ svābhāvikaṃ karma jñānaṃ ca mṛtyuśabdavācyamubhayaṃ tīrtvā atikramya vidyayā devatājñānenāmṛtaṃ devatātmabhāvamaśnute prāpnoti /
GV05isupsb_u:205: tato bhūya iva te tamo ya u sambhūtyāṃ ratāḥ // IsUp_12 //
GV05isupsb_u:206: andhaṃ tamaḥ praviśanti ye asambhūtiṃ sambhavanaṃ sambhūtiḥ sā yasya kāryasya sā
GV05isupsb_u:207: sambhūtiḥ tasyā anyā asambhūtiḥ prakṛtiḥ kāraṇamavidyā avyākṛtākhyā tāmasambhūtimavyākṛtākhyāṃ
GV05isupsb_u:208: prakṛtiṃ kāraṇamavidyāṃ kāmakarmabījabhūtāmadarśanātmikāmupāsate ye te tadanurūpamevāndhaṃ
GV05isupsb_u:210: tatastasmādapi bhūyo bahutaramiva tamaḥ praviśanti ya u sambhūtyāṃ kāryabrahmaṇi hiraṇyagarbhākhye ratāḥ //IsUpBh_12//
GV05isupsb_u:212: anyad evāhuḥ saṃbhavād anyad āhur asaṃbhavāt /
GV05isupsb_u:213: iti śuśruma dhīrāṇāṃ ye nas tad vicacakṣire // IsUp_13 //
GV05isupsb_u:214: anyadeva pṛthagevāhuḥ phalaṃ sambhavātsambhūteḥ kāryabrahmopāsanādaṇimādyaiśvaryalakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyātavanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:216: yaduktamandhantamaḥ praviśantīti prakṛtilaya iti ca paurāṇikairucyata ityevaṃ śuśruma
GV05isupsb_u:217: dhīraṇāṃ vacanaṃ ye nastadvicacakṣire vyākṛtāvyākṛtopāsanaphalaṃ vyākhyātavanta ityarthaḥ //IsUpBh_13 //
GV05isupsb_u:219: saṃbhūtiṃ ca vināśaṃ ca yas tad vedobhayaṃ saha /
GV05isupsb_u:220: vināśena mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā saṃbhūtyāmṛtam aśnute // IsUp_14 //
GV05isupsb_u:221: sambhūtiṃ ca vināśaṃ ca yastadvedobhayaṃ saha vināśo dharmo yasya kāryasya sa tena dharmiṇā abhedena ucyate vināśa iti,
GV05isupsb_u:222: tena tadupāsanenānaiśvaryamadharmakāmādidoṣajātaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā-- hiraṇyagarbhopāsanenāpti hyāṇimādiprāptiḥ phalam,
GV05isupsb_u:224: sambhūtiṃ ca vināśaṃ cetyatrāvarṇalopena nirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ prakṛtilayaphalaśrutyanurodhāt //IsUpBh_14//
GV05isupsb_u:227: ataḥ paraṃ pūrvoktamātmaivābhūdvijānata iti sarvātmabhāva eva sarveṣaṇāsaṃnyāsajñānaniṣṭhāphalam /
GV05isupsb_u:229: tatra pravṛttilakṣaṇasya vedārthasya vidhipratiṣedhalakṣaṇasya vedārthasya vidhipratiṣedhalakṣaṇasya kṛtsnasya prakāśane pravargyāntaṃ brāhmaṇamupayuktam
GV05isupsb_u:231: tatra niṣekādiśmaśānāntaṃ karma kurvan jijīviṣedyo vidyayā sahāparabrahmaviṣayayā taduktaṃ 'vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yastadvedobhayaṃ saha /
GV05isupsb_u:234: tadyattatsatyamasau sa ādityo ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣa etadubhayaṃ satyam /
GV05isupsb_u:235: brahmopāsīno yathoktakarmakṛcca yaḥ so 'ntakāle prāpte satyātmānamātmanaḥ prāptidvāraṃ yācate 'hiraṇmayena pātreṇa' iti /
GV05isupsb_u:237: tat tvaṃ pūṣann apāvṛṇu satyadharmāya dṛṣṭaye // IsUp_15 //
GV05isupsb_u:239: tena pātreṇeva apidhānabhūtena satyasyaivādityamaṇḍalasthasya brāhmaṇo 'pihitam ācchāditaṃ mukhaṃ dvāram /
GV05isupsb_u:240: tattvaṃ he pūṣannapāvṛṇvapasāraya satyasya upāsanātsatyaṃ dharmo yasya mama so 'haṃ
GV05isupsb_u:241: satyadharmā tasmai mahyamathavā yathābhūtasya dharmasyānuṣṭhātre dṛṣṭaye tava satyātmana
GV05isupsb_u:243: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:244: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamaṃ tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi // IsUp_16 //
GV05isupsb_u:245: he pūṣan/ jagataḥ poṣaṇātpūṣā ravistathaika eva ṛṣati gacchati ityekarṣiḥ-- he ekarṣe/
GV05isupsb_u:247: tathā raśmīnāṃ prāṇānāṃ rasānāñca svīkaraṇāt sūryaḥ-- he sūrya/
GV05isupsb_u:251: yatte tava rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamam atyantaśobhanaṃ tatte tavātmanaḥ prasādāt paśyāmi /
GV05isupsb_u:252: kiñcāhaṃ na tu tvāṃ bhṛtyavadyāce yo 'sāvādityamaṇḍalastho vyāhṛtyavayavaḥ puruṣaḥ
GV05isupsb_u:253: puruṣākāratvātpūrṇaṃ vānena prāṇabuddhayātmanā jagatsamastamiti puruṣaḥ puri śayanādvā
GV05isupsb_u:255: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram /
GV05isupsb_u:256: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara // IsUp_17 //
GV05isupsb_u:257: athedānīṃ mama mariṣyato vāyuḥ prāṇo 'dhyātmaparicchedaṃ hitvādhidaivatātmānaṃ sarvātmakamanilamamṛtaṃ sūtrātmānaṃ pratipadyatāmiti vākyaśeṣaḥ
GV05isupsb_u:263: smara yanmama smartavyaṃ tasya kālo 'yaṃ pratyupasthito 'taḥ smara /
GV05isupsb_u:264: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ bhāvitaṃ kṛtamagne smara yanmayā bālyaprabhṛtyanuṣṭhitaṃ karma tacca smara /
GV05isupsb_u:267: agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /
GV05isupsb_u:268: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te nama uktiṃ vidhema // IsUp_18 //
GV05isupsb_u:269: he agne/ naya gamaya supathā śobhanena mārgeṇa /
GV05isupsb_u:271: nirviṇṇo 'haṃ dakṣiṇena mārgeṇa gatāgatalakṣaṇenāto yāce tvāṃ punaḥ punargamanāgamanavarjitena śobhanena pathā naya /
GV05isupsb_u:275: kiñca yuyodhi viyojaya vināśaya asmadasmatto juhurāṇaṃ kuṭilaṃ vañcanātmakamenaḥ pāpam /
GV05isupsb_u:276: tato vayaṃ viśuddhāḥ santa iṣṭaṃ prāpsyāma ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:277: kintu vayamidānīṃ te na śaknumaḥ paricaryāṃ kartum /
GV05isupsb_u:278: bhūyiṣṭhāṃ bahutarāṃ te tubhyaṃ nama uktiṃ namaskāravacanaṃ vidhema namaskāreṇa paricarema ityarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:289: yathā ca na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtānīti śāstrādavagataṃ punaḥ śāstreṇaiva bādhyate 'dhvare paśuṃ hiṃsyāditi /
GV05isupsb_u:292: na“dūramete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyā“(ka.u.1 / 2 / 4) iti śruteḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:293: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ceti vacanādavirodha iti cet?
GV05isupsb_u:299: na hyagniruṣṇaḥ prakāśaśceti vijñānotpattau yasminnāśraye tadutpannaṃ tasminnevāśraye
GV05isupsb_u:300: śīto 'gniraprakāśo vetyavidyāyā utpattirnāpi saṃśayo 'jñānaṃ vā“yasmin sarvāṇi bhūtānyātmaivābhūdvijānataḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:301: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ“(ī.u.7)
GV05isupsb_u:306: tasmādupāsanayā samuccayo na paramātmavijñāneneti yathāsmābhirvyākhyāta eva mantrāṇāmartha ityuparamyate //IsUpBh_18//
